item.title: Authority Issues - Podcast
item.description:
Best way to spend 48 minutes of your life! I was the guest at the 62nd episode of Authority Issues podcast. It was a real pleasure to chat with Rachel and Kendall.

We talked about what I studied, how I started my career, my getting into management, my first leadship position, my mistakes, and many more...

Yaz Erkan (Pex) - Authority Issues - Episode 62
